moves.1. e4: This is a team game.  I've recently had a dreadful record on Gameknot, and in team games in particular, but this game goes some way to restore my equilibrium.
moves.5. Bb3 Nf6 6. O-O Nxe4 7. d4: the game develops quickly and sharply
moves.8... Nxf2: Making the best of a bad job, I suspect
moves.9... Bd7 10. Bxd7+: This may seem less profitable than taking the R on a8 but it gives check, so I also pick up the N on f2, without giving Black the chance to take my Q on d1
moves.13. Bf4: White now proceeds to complete development as quickly as possible
moves.13... Be7 14. Nc3 c6: depriving White of the d5 square for his N
moves.16... Bd8 17. Qxd6 Bb6+ 18. Kh1 Qf5: Black sensibly avoids the Q swap at this stage
Everything is now ready to aim at Black's K
moves.23. Nxf6 Rxe6 24. Nxh5 Rxe2 25. Rxe2 g6: 25...Rxf5 26. Re8  Rf8 27. Rxf8   so Black had no choice.
